articles.author: Brian Evans
articles.title: Stock futures are flat after investors sell tech names to start the second half of 2025: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Traders began the second half of 2025 with a rotation away from tech highflyers.
articles.content:
Stock futures were little changed on Tuesday evening, after investors began the second half with a reduced appetite for technology stocks.
Futures tied to the Dow Jones Industrial Average added 9 po… [+1784 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Threads gets its own DMs as app distances itself from Instagram - TechCrunch
articles.description: At launch, Threads DMs will support one-on-one chats, preset emoji reactions, the ability to report spam, and mute DMs (as on Instagram). Other features, like group messaging, inbox filters, and more advanced message controls, will arrive in a later release.
articles.content: Instagram Threads is rolling out users’ most-requested feature to date: the ability to message people directly, without having to switch to another app, like Instagram. The company said direct messag… [+5269 chars]
